text: David Adkins (born November 10, 1956), better known as Sinbad, is an American stand-up comedian, actor, rapper, and voice artist. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Michigan Category:African-American actors Category:African-American comedians Category:American movie actors Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American television actors Category:American television talk show hosts Category:Participants in American reality television series Category:Comedians from Michigan
title: Sinbad (comedian)
